global.needHelpText: Need help? Join us on Gladys Community.

calendar.noEventsInRange: There are no events in this range.

login.title: Gladys Assistant
login.needHelpText: Need help? Join us on Gladys Community.

welcome.title: Welcome to Gladys üôã
welcome.introSentence: First, thank you for choosing me. I'm Gladys, a privacy-friendly home assistant for your house.
welcome.introTimeToCreateAccount: It's time to create a local account for your Gladys setup.
welcome.introDontWorryLocal: Don't worry: Gladys is fully self-hosted, and all the information you'll enter is only saved in the local database of Gladys.
welcome.introInCaseOfIssues: In case you have issues installing Gladys, check out our documentation or ask a question on Gladys community.
welcome.buttonCreateAccountWithEmail: Create local account with your Email

createLocalAccount.title: Create your local Gladys account
createLocalAccount.description: All information entered here is only saved locally in Gladys database. You can update it later at any time.
createLocalAccount.emailError: Email is not a valid email
createLocalAccount.passwordError: Password should be at least 8 characters.
createLocalAccount.networkError: Network Error: We didn't succeed in contacting your Gladys instance. Are you connected to the network? Is your Gladys instance running?
createLocalAccount.emailAlreadyExistError: A user with this email already exist.
createLocalAccount.selectorAlreadyExistError: A user with this first name already exist.

restoreBackupSetBackupKey.title: Enter your backup key
restoreBackupSetBackupKey.description: As Gladys Plus backups are end-to-end encrypted, we need you to enter your backup key. Your local instance can only decrypt the backup with this backup key.

restoreBackupInProgress.title: Restore in progress...
restoreBackupInProgress.description: At the end of the restore process, Gladys will restart automatically.
restoreBackupInProgress.errored: Backup restore failed, maybe the restore key is not valid

gatewayBackup.title: Choose a backup
gatewayBackup.description: Choose the backup you want to restore in this list.

preferences.title: Your preferences
preferences.description: You can modify those settings later.

configureHouse.title: Configure your house
configureHouse.description: All information is only saved in Gladys local database. If you have several houses, you can configure them later in Gladys.
configureHouse.houseLocationLabel: Click where you house is located
configureHouse.roomsLabel: Add all rooms in your house
configureHouse.roomNamePlaceHolder: Type a new room to add
configureHouse.conflictError: A house with the same name already exist.
configureHouse.roomConflictError: A room with the same name already exist.
configureHouse.validationError: House name should be between 1 and 40 characters
configureHouse.validationErrorRoom: Room name should be between 1 and 40 characters

success.title: Allow me to thank you üôè
success.introduction: I'm Pierre-Gilles Leymarie, and I founded Gladys Assistant in 2013.
success.thanksForChoosingOpenSource: I would like to thank you for choosing Gladys üôå I hope you'll enjoy using this software as much as I enjoyed building it.
success.ifYouWantToSupportThisSotware: As Gladys is now my main job, I rely on contributions to make this project substainable. If you want to support Gladys and get access to additional features, read more about Gladys Plus.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.emptyDashboardSentenceTop: Looks like your dashboard is not configured yet.
dashboard.emptyDashboardSentenceBottom: Click on the "Edit" button to design your dashboard.
dashboard.gatewayInstanceNotFoundError: Your Gladys instance is not connected to the Gladys Gateway

weather.editHouseLabel: Select a house. I will use its latitude/longitude to get the weather.
weather.houseHasNoCoordinates: Your house has no coordinates defined. Go to Gladys parameters to define the position of your house.
weather.serviceNotConfigured: The OpenWeather service is not configured. Please go to the 'Integrations' tab, and configure the OpenWeather service.
weather.requestToThirdPartyFailed: The request to OpenWeather API failed. Is your Gladys instance connected to the internet? Please go to the OpenWeather configuration panel to troubleshoot this problem.
weather.clickHere: Click here to access the OpenWeather configuration panel.
weather.unknownError: We are unable to get the weather for this house. Did you define a house for this box?

devicesInRoom.editRoomLabel: Select the room you want to display here.
devicesInRoom.editDeviceFeaturesLabel: Select the devices you want to display. Only lights / sensors are showed here.
devicesInRoom.noDevices:
Looks you don't have any devices in your house!
Define your device in the integration page.

temperatureInRoom.editRoomLabel: Select the room you want to display here.

userPresence.description: Display who's at home and who is not.
userPresence.error: There was a network error fetching the list of user. Please refresh.
userPresence.emptyText: There are no users to display here. You can add users in Gladys settings.

camera.editCameraLabel: Select the camera you want to display here.
camera.editBoxNameLabel: Enter the name you want to give to the box:

telegram.title: Telegram
telegram.introduction: To connect Gladys to Telegram, you first need to create a Telegram bot using the Botfather. Send a /newbot message to the @BotFather in Telegram. Then, enter the API key he gave you below.
telegram.link: ACTION REQUIRED: To talk to Gladys in Telegram, click on this link. Don't speak in Telegram directly to your bot before having click on this link, otherwise your bot won't be able to know that it's you who are sending a message.
telegram.note: This link is unique to your account, do not send it to other users.
telegram.configurationError: We were not able to configure your account. Are you sure this token is valid?

setup.bridgeButtonNotPressed: Bridge button not pressed: Please press the button on your Philips Hue bridge and try again.
setup.unknownError: An unknown error occured. Please try again or contact Gladys community.
setup.noBridgesFound: We didn't find any Philips Hue bridges on your network. Are you sure you are connected to the same network as your bridge and your bridge is turned on?

device.title: Devices in Gladys
device.noDevices: No Philips Hue device added yet.
device.deviceNotHandled: Device not handled yet, please contact us to help us connect it in Gladys!
device.noDevicesFound: No devices found. Make sure you have connected one Philips Hue bridge in the setup tab.

rtspCamera.title: Cameras
rtspCamera.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of your camera
rtspCamera.saveError: There was an error saving the camera.
rtspCamera.testConnectionError: There was an error while getting the RTSP Flux. Are you sure the provided URL is right and accessible from Gladys instance?

tasmota.title: Tasmota

mqtt.title: Tasmota discover devices over MQTT
mqtt.description: Configured Tasmota devices are automatically discovered over MQTT network.

http.title: Tasmota discover devices over HTTP
http.needAuthenticationAlert: The device is protected with username and password.

tasmota.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of your device

error.defaultError: There was an error saving the device.
error.defaultDeletionError: There was an error deleting the device.
error.conflictError: Current topic is already in use.

zigbee2mqtt.title: Zigbee2mqtt

status.notConfigured: Zigbee2mqtt USB dongle is not configured, please go to
status.notConnected: Zigbee2mqtt service failed to connect, please go to

settings.title: Zigbee2mqtt USB dongle Settings
settings.description: To use Zigbee2mqtt in Gladys, you need to have a Zigbee2mqtt USB Dongle attached to your Gladys instance.
settings.zigbee2mqttUsbDriverPathLabel: Select the USB port where your Zigbee2mqtt Dongle is connected
settings.notAttached: Gladys is not attached to any Zigbee2mqtt USB Dongle.

setup.title: Zigbe2mqtt configuration
setup.description: This service uses two independant docker containers (MQTT broker and Zigbee2mqtt). Enable Zigbee2mqtt for deploying these containers. Learn more on the Zigbee2mqtt documentation page
setup.error: An error occured while starting Zigbee2mqtt.

discover.title: Zigbee2mqtt discover
discover.noDeviceDiscovered: No device discovered, please click on scan button.
discover.noResponse: Scan never answer, please check your network.

zigbee2mqtt.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of your device
zigbee2mqtt.saveError: There was an error saving the device.

setup.title: Z-Wave Devices
setup.noZwaveDevices: No Z-Wave devices found. Have you selected your USB dongle port in Settings?
setup.name: Name
setup.zwaveNotConfiguredError: Z-wave is not configured. Please select the USB port where you Z-Wave key is plugged in settings.
setup.createDeviceError: There was an error while creating this device in Gladys.
setup.conflictError: A device with this name already exist, please rename the device or delete the existing device.
setup.deviceCreatedSuccess: The device was added with success.
setup.sleepingNodeMsg: Node sleeping or dead. Wake it up then refresh this page.
setup.createGithubIssue: Report a bug with this device

settings.title: Z-Wave Settings
settings.description: To use Z-Wave in Gladys, you need to have a Z-Wave USB Stick connected to your Gladys instance.
settings.zwaveUsbDriverPathLabel: Select the USB port where your Z-Wave stick is connected
settings.notConnected: Gladys is not connected to any Z-Wave USB stick.
settings.connectedWithSuccess: Z-Wave USB stick connected with success.
settings.connecting: Trying to connect to Z-Wave USB stick...
settings.driverFailedError: An error occured while trying to connect to Z-Wave USB stick.

nodeOperation.addNodeInstructions: You can now include your device following instructions in your device manual.
nodeOperation.removeNodeInstructions: You can now exclude your device following instructions in your device manual.
nodeOperation.nodeAddedDescription: Wait a few seconds while we get all of the information from this node...

openWeather.title: OpenWeather API
openWeather.introduction: This integration helps you integrate with OpenWeather API to get the weather in Gladys.
openWeather.instructions: You first need to create an account on OpenWeather API website: https://openweathermap.org/api.
openWeather.apiKeyLabel: Then, enter your API key here:
openWeather.instructionsToUse: To use this integration, go to the dashboard and create a weather box.

status.notConfigured: MQTT service is not configured, please go to
status.notConnected: MQTT service failed to connect to network, please go to

device.title: MQTT Devices
device.saveConflictError: Conflict: Are you sure all device feature external IDs are unique?

feature.externalIdMessage: The external ID is an unique ID which helps you identify this device outside of Gladys when sending a MQTT message. It musts start with "mqtt:". Read the MQTT API documentation here.
feature.readOnlyButton: Yes, it's a sensor sending data to Gladys only.

setup.title: MQTT configuration
setup.mqttDescription: You can connect Gladys to a MQTT broker to send & receive MQTT messages. Learn more about Gladys MQTT API here.
setup.nonDockerEnv: Gladys is not running on Docker, you cannot install a MQTT broker from here.
setup.invalidDockerNetwork: Gladys is under custom installation, to install broker from here, Gladys container should be configured with "host" network mode.
setup.installBrokerContainer: Use broker in a Docker container.
setup.brokerDockerNotInstalled: No broker is available yet on current Docker environment, continue to install and configure eclipse-mosquitto broker inside a Docker container.
setup.installBrokerError: An error occured while installing Docker container, please consult Gladys logs.
setup.error: An error occured while saving configuration.
setup.connecting: Configuration saved. Now connecting to your MQTT broker...
setup.connected: Connected to the MQTT broker with success !
setup.connectionError: Error while connecting, please check your configuration.

setup.title: Xiaomi devices not in Gladys
setup.description: Devices detected by the Xiaomi Gateway will be added here when they send data. Your Xiaomi Gateway needs to be in developer mode. Learn more here.
setup.createDeviceError: There was an error while creating this device in Gladys.

caldav.title: CalDAV
caldav.introduction: To sync Gladys calendar using CalDAV, you first need an external compatible calendar. Then enter the configuration below.
caldav.hostInfo: Choose your calendar host to be helped during configuration.

apple.name: iCloud Calendar
apple.urlInfo: Let default URL, it will be set automatically.
apple.passwordInfo: Generate an app-specific password and use this app-specific password instead of your account password.

google.name: Google Calendar (deprecated)
google.urlInfo: Let default URL, it will be set automatically.
google.passwordInfo: Generate an app-specific password and use this app-specific password instead of your account password.

synology.name: Synology Calendar
synology.urlInfo: In calendar application, click on 'CalDAV Account' and copy 'macOS/iOS' URL.

caldav.configurationError: Check settings and CalDAV server status.
caldav.configurationRetrievePrincipalUrlError: Can't retrieve your account principal URL, check settings and CalDAV server status.
caldav.configurationRetrieveHomeUrlError: Can't retrieve your account home URL, check settings and CalDAV server status.
caldav.cleanUpError: An error occured while trying clean up.
caldav.synchronizationDefaultError: An error occured while trying synchronization.
caldav.synchronizationBadCredentialsError: Service not yet configured, enter your CalDAV parameters and click 'save'.
caldav.synchronizationRequestCalendarsError: Can't fetch calendars, verify your configuration and CalDAV server state.
caldav.synchronizationRequestChangesError: Can't fetch changes, verify your configuration and CalDAV server state.
caldav.synchronizationRequestEventsError: Can't fetch events, verify your configuration and CalDAV server state.

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth
bluetooth.bluetoothNotReadyError: Bluetooth device is not reachable, please check it is enabled.

setup.title: Bluetooth Setup
setup.createDeviceError: There was an error while creating this device in Gladys.
setup.notManagedByBluteooth: You cannot manage this device here as it is already manager by "{{service}}" service.
setup.saveError: There was an error creating the device.

peripheral.title: Bluetooth Peripheral Configuration
peripheral.notAvailable: Peripheral is not available, please scan again.

editScene.noTriggersYet: No trigger added yet. It's not mandatory to have a trigger in a scene.
editScene.noActionsYet: No actions added yet. Click on the + button to add an action to this scene.
editScene.triggersDescription: Every trigger is independent. When any of those triggers are triggered, the scene will run.
editScene.actionsDescription: All actions in this block will run in parallel. To make a sequence of actions, add actions to the next block.
editScene.saveSceneError: There was an error saving your scene. Please check that all actions/triggers are filled and correct.

delay.label: This block will wait the specified duration.

turnOnLights.label: Select the lights you want to turn on

turnOffLights.label: Select the lights you want to turn off

turnOnSwitches.label: Select the switches you want to turn on

turnOffSwitches.label: Select the switches you want to turn off

deviceGetValue.description: This will get the last value of the selected device, so you can use it later in the scene.

newState.onlyExecuteAtThreshold: Execute only when threshold is passed (and not at every value sent by the device)

profile.title: Profile
profile.selectorText: The selector is the unique identifier of your user. It can be used in the API.
profile.emailError: Email is not a valid email
profile.passwordError: Password should be at least 8 characters.
profile.networkError: Network Error: We didn't succeed in contacting your Gladys instance. Are you connected to the network? Is your Gladys instance running?
profile.emailAlreadyExistError: A user with this email already exist.
profile.selectorAlreadyExistError: A user with this first name already exist.
profile.instanceAlreadyConfiguredError: This instance is already configured. You cannot create another account.
profile.unknownError: An unknown error occured. Please try again or contact Gladys community.

forgotPassword.title: Gladys Assistant
forgotPassword.wrongEmailError: This is not a valid email
forgotPassword.networkError: Network Error: We didn't succeed in contacting your Gladys instance. Are you connected to the network? Is your Gladys instance running?
forgotPassword.unknownError: An unknown error occured. Please try again or contact Gladys community.
forgotPassword.success: Success! You should see a reset password link in Gladys logs.
forgotPassword.userNotFound: There is no account linked to this email.
forgotPassword.rateLimitError: You have tried this form too many time. Please retry in 30 minutes or restart your Gladys instance now.
forgotPassword.invalidEmail: We are unable to verify your email address.
forgotPassword.validationLinkConfirmation: Are you sure you clicked/copied the link correctly?
forgotPassword.contactUs: If it still not working, please contact us on Twitter or on Gladys Community.

resetPassword.title: Gladys Assistant
resetPassword.resetSuccess: Password reset with success! Click here to login.

httpErrors.rateLimitError: You have tried this form too many time. Please retry in 30 minutes or restart your Gladys instance now.
httpErrors.unknownError: An unknown error occured. Please try again or contact Gladys community.
httpErrors.networkError: Network Error:  We didn't succeed in contacting your Gladys instance. Are you connected to the network? Is your Gladys instance running?

systemSettings.timezoneText: The timezone is used in scheduled scene.

newScene.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of your scene
newScene.iconLabel: Select an icon for you scene
newScene.invalidName: Name is required and cannot be 'new'
newScene.sceneAlreadyExist: A scene with that name already exist.

gateway.yourGatewayIsConfigured: Your Gladys Plus account is configured.
gateway.yourGatewayIsConnected: Your Gladys instance is connected to the remote gateway.
gateway.yourGatewayIsNotConnected: Your Gladys instance is currently not connected to the remote gateway.
gateway.backupKeyDescription: Your backup key is used to securely encrypt your Gladys backups. Please save this key somewhere outside of Gladys to be able to restore Gladys. We recommend using a password manager for that.
gateway.usersListDescription: To ensure that your local instance remains secure, you need to manually grant access to each users in this list.
gateway.gatewayConnectedSuccessDescription: Your Gladys instance was successfully connected.
gateway.gatewayConnectedSuccessBackupKey: It'll backup automatically everyday, encrypted with the following key. So you can restore your instance later, please save this encryption key somewhere, outside of Gladys. Without this key, you will not be able to restore Gladys.

gatewayPricing.pricingSentence: Gladys Assistant is free to use, but you can subscribe to Gladys Plus for additional premium features!
gatewayPricing.alreadyGladysPlusSubscriber: Already a Gladys Plus Subscriber? Click here to login.

gatewayLogin.cardTitle: Login to your Gladys Plus account
gatewayLogin.networkError: Network Error: Are you sure your Gladys instance is connected to the internet?
gatewayLogin.userNotAcceptedLocally: Your user is not accepted locally, please go back to your Gladys instance and allow access to this user in settings.
gatewayLogin.gatewayNoInstanceFound: No Instance found. You need to first connect your instance to Gladys.
gatewayLogin.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please contact us for more information.

gatewayBackup.title: Backups
gatewayBackup.description: If you are subscribed to Gladys Plus, Gladys creates encrypted backup of your instance every 24 hours. Only you can decrypt backups. You can restore those backups in one-click in this installation, or any new setup.
gatewayBackup.notConfigured: Gladys Plus need to be configured to enable backups. Go to the Gladys Plus tab to configure it.
gatewayBackup.restoreFailed: Restoring the backup failed. Are you sure you have the same backup key used during the backup ? You can go to the Gladys Plus tab in settings to set another backup key.

errorPage.title: Oops... This page does not exist.
errorPage.description: If you think it's a Gladys Assistant bug, please report it to our team!

examples.showCameraImage: "Show me camera image in the kitchen"

gatewayLinkUser.title: Configure Gladys Plus
gatewayLinkUser.label: Select you Gladys user
gatewayLinkUser.description: Before selecting your user here, please make sure that this user is accepted locally in your Gladys instance (In "Settings" => "Gladys Plus" => "Users").
gatewayLinkUser.noInstanceFound: Your Gladys instance is not connected to the Gladys Gateway. Did you connect to your Gladys Plus account in your Gladys installation?
gatewayLinkUser.error: An error occurred. Is your user accepted locally in your Gladys instance?

editDeviceForm.externalIdMessage: The feature external ID is an unique ID which helps you identify this feature outside of Gladys, for example when calling the API.
editDeviceForm.saveConflictError: Conflict: Are you sure all device feature external IDs are unique?

gatewaySignup.title: Gladys Assistant
gatewaySignup.emailAlreadyExistError: An account with that email already exist
gatewaySignup.browserNotCompatibleError: Sorry, your browser is not compatible with the Gladys Gateway. Your browser should support the WebCrypto API.
gatewaySignup.tokenError: You have to subscribe to the Gladys Community Package on Gladys website first!
gatewaySignup.unknownError: An unknown error occured. Please retry later or contact me at hello@gladysassistant.com to understand what happened.
gatewaySignup.invalidInvitationError: We cannot retrieve your invitation. Maybe it was already used or it has expired! Please contact us at hello@gladysassistant.com.

gatewaySubscribe.paymentSecuredByStripe: üîí Payment Secured by Stripe
gatewaySubscribe.emailAlreadyExist: An account with this email address already exist!
gatewaySubscribe.paymentFailed: Payment failed. Please try again or try with a different card.
gatewaySubscribe.paymentSuccess: Congrats, you just subscribed to Gladys Plus. Check your email to get access to the Slack and the Gladys Gateway. Thanks for your support!

gatewayForgotPassword.success: If this account exist, you've receive an email with a reset password link.

gatewayResetPassword.incompatibleBrowserLabel: Sorry, your browser is not compatible with the Gladys Gateway. Your browser should support the WebCrypto API as well as IndexedDB databases.
gatewayResetPassword.errorLinkLabel: We cannot retrieve your reset password link. Maybe it was already used or has expired!

gatewayOpenApi.title: Open API
gatewayOpenApi.description: The Open API allows you to send information to Gladys outside of your network. For now, it allows you to send Owntracks data only.
gatewayOpenApi.warningKeyDisappear: Warning: You'll see the key only once. Copy paste your key and save it somewhere.

gatewayTwoFactorAuth.title: Gladys Gateway
gatewayTwoFactorAuth.securityIsImportant: The security of your Gladys Gateway account is really important to us.
gatewayTwoFactorAuth.securityApps: To ensure that your account remains secure, please enable two-factor authentication using a two-factor app like Authy on iOS or Android.
gatewayTwoFactorAuth.invalidCode: The 2FA code you provided is not valid.

gatewaySignUp.done: Done! You can now login here.
gatewaySignUp.usernameInvalid: Name should be between 2 and 30 characters

gatewayBilling.title: Billing
gatewayBilling.stripeDescription: Billing is handled by Stripe. We never see you credit card.
